summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3765 for the improvement of East 57th Street from 8th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46310, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
